MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA13 postcode area of Kilwinning. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.00 noon to make a permanent repair to a faulty section of underground cable in Dalgarven and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.06am on the 15th of April 2021.
